Messages.Author: Kartikey Sharma
Messages.Content: Hi Everyone The time and location of the class have changed. New Location: EW 202 New Time: 12:00 - 14:00 on Monday

Messages.Author: Kartikey Sharma
Messages.Content: Time: Mondays 12:00-14:00  Place: EW 202 Begins: April 15, 2024 (weekly) Language of Instruction: English  This course covers topics in the domain of optimization under uncertainty. Specifically, it focuses on theoretical results and practical methods for the topics of Stochastic Optimization and Robust Optimization. Expected Qualifications: Knowledge of Linear Programming and Probability Theory The topics covered include Models for Optimization under Uncertainty Stochastic Optimization Problem Formulation 2 Stage Recourse L-shaped method Sample Average Approximation Robust Optimization Problem Formulation Uncertainty Sets Robust Counterparts Adjustable Robust Optimization  If time permits we will also cover a brief introduction to distributionally robust optimization.
